nsubj fear Police	15.060439779775294
acl Police abandon	15.060439779775294
dobj abandon posts	15.060439779775294
nmod:in posts Lesotho	15.060439779775294
case Lesotho in	14.367292599215348
nmod:for fear lives	13.674145418655403
case lives for	11.210292178065234
punct fear ,	10.155165001336863
root ROOT fear	9.571502053618607
